title: US Poverty Rates Graph - Cause of Trend

content.question: Which of the following developments was most directly associated with the trend shown in the graph between 1960 and 1965 ?

choices.label: The levying of high tariffs on imported goods
The growth in the number of American farmers
The increase in federal subsidies for manufacturers
The expansion of the private sector of the economy

content.answer: The expansion of the private sector of the economy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
